text:
Something changed in the validator recently and it now claims that default 
attributes are required!

xmlns.xml:
<!DOCTYPE foo [
<!ELEMENT foo EMPTY>
<!ATTLIST foo xmlns CDATA "foo.com">
]>
<foo/>

java sax.DocumentTracer xmlns.xml gives:
[Error] xmlns.xml:5:7: Attribute "xmlns" is required and must be specified for 
element type "foo".
creator: lehors@apache.org
lehors@apache.org
text:
Well, the problem must have come from some classes being out of synch or 
something, it turns out that after a clean build the problem disappeared...
Sorry for the trouble.
